titleStmt.title: The strife of brethren, and A treaty for peace two sermons, the one preached at the morning lecture ... / by John Fathers ...
titleStmt.author: Fathers, John.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Matthew Simmons, and are to be sold by Christopher Meredith ...,

notesStmt.note: Includes two additional sermons, "The content of a wayfaring man" and "The account of a ministers removal", which have special t.p.
Imperfect: pages stained and cropped with some loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
